long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Our Website Availability Test extension is an easy-to-use tool for checking if a specified URL loads correctly worldwide. Simply enter the website URL, and you will be redirected to Uptimia to test your website. The tool is completely free.
